message.content:
cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.CC, cs.NE, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques to optimize cloud instance selection, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also focuses on decision making in cloud environments, which is related to distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of analytics to determine the most suitable instance type and time for starting or migrating instances, which is related to cloud computing (cs.CC). The paper also mentions the use of machine learning to develop an adaptive deployment policy, which falls under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). Finally, the paper discusses the experimental study based on a major public cloud infrastructure, which is related to machine learning (cs.LG).
